item.title: Neuro-Oncology
item.description: Neuro Oncology It is the officical journal of the Society for Neuro-Oncology and published monthly from Jan.2010. Kenneth Aldape is the interim editor-in-chief. His research area is genomic and epigenomic alterations in brain tumors, including glioma and meningioma. His valuable contribution to brain tumor is (1) (2) Reference:
